Thank you very much for the Dragons Lair post.  I just got done beating it with my DVD player.  It was lots of fun!  The Dragons Lair (end level) took me about 15 tries to beat though :)  The knight with the electricity was my biggest problem.  I never came close in the arcade since I was poor (and still am).  I appreciate you giving me the chance to play through this game.

to change to region 1

burn this image
dl and install Anydvd
open burnt dvd with anydvd
change to region one with anydvd
now you can read/play it
now use nero or whatever to make a region one image from whats open in anydvd (because anydvd make it look like a region 1, the resulting image will be region 1.)
now burn your new region 1 image and it will play in your usa r1 dvd player or drive

You don't need to burn a disc to use with Daphne. Just mount as a virtual DVD ROM with daemon tools and Daphne will use it to decode the automatic file download. BTW, Daphne uses a built-in bittorrent client for this, so you need to exit your regular client until it's finished.
